00016 // DBG_OUT range for general FtpServer stuff
00017 #define FTPSERVER_DBG_OUT_RANGE 35910

00019 #define FTPSERVER_DBG_OUT_RANGE_EXTENDED 35911
00020 // DBG_OUT range for FTP commands

00022 // DBG_OUT range for FTP replies
00023 #define FTPSERVER_DBG_OUT_RANGE_REPLY 35913

00025 
00026 // maximum length of an FTP request
00027 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_REQUEST_LENGTH 1024
00028 
00029 
00030 #if defined(APOXI_TARGETSYSTEM_HOST)
00031 
00032 // default size for transmitting data from or to clients
00033 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_TRANSFER_DEFAULT_BLOCKLENGTH (128*1024)
00034 // default maximum of currently connected clients
00035 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_DEFAULT_MAX_USERS 5
00036 // default value for backlog of FtpServerSocket when listening
00037 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_DEFAULT_BACKLOG 25
00038 
00039 #elif defined(APOXI_TARGETSYSTEM_HW)
00040 
00041 // default size for transmitting data from or to clients
00042 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_TRANSFER_DEFAULT_BLOCKLENGTH (8*1024)
00043 // default maximum of currently connected clients
00044 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_DEFAULT_MAX_USERS 5
00045 // default value for backlog of FtpServerSocket when listening
00046 #define APOXI_FTPSERVER_DEFAULT_BACKLOG 15
00047 
00048 #endif

00051 /* Commands used internally by FtpServer to keep public interface but 
00052     initialize SocketHandler in the right ExecutionContext.
00053 */
00054 enum FtpServiceCommand {
00055     c_ftp_service_command_init,
00056     c_ftp_service_command_terminate,
00057     c_ftp_service_command_start,
00058     c_ftp_service_command_stop
00059 };
00060 
00061 enum FtpServiceCommandError {
00062     c_ftp_service_command_error_success,
00063     c_ftp_service_command_error_failed
00064 };
00065 
00066 /* Types of connections.
00067 */
00068 enum FtpConnectionType {
00069     c_ftp_conn_type_control,
00070     c_ftp_conn_type_data
00071 };
00072 
00073 /* Types of modi for establishing the data connection (from the server's point of view).
00074 */
00075 enum FtpDataConnectionType {
00076     c_ftp_data_conn_type_active,
00077     c_ftp_data_conn_type_passive
00078 };
00079 
00080 /* Types which are used defining the data connection.
00081 */
00082 enum FtpTransferMode {
00083     c_ftp_transfer_mode_stream,
00084     c_ftp_transfer_mode_block,
00085     c_ftp_transfer_mode_compressed
00086 };
00087 
00088 enum FtpTransferType {
00089     c_ftp_transfer_type_ascii,
00090     c_ftp_transfer_type_image
00091 };
00092 
00093 enum FtpTransferStructure {
00094     c_ftp_transfer_structure_file,
00095     c_ftp_transfer_structure_record,
00096     //  c_ftp_transfer_structure_page
00097 };
00098 
00099 enum FtpTransferError {
00100     c_ftp_transfer_error_created,   // a new transfer was created
00101     c_ftp_transfer_error_started,   // a transfer was started
00102     c_ftp_transfer_error_progress,  // a transfer successfully progressed
00103     c_ftp_transfer_error_not_running,   // a transfer is not running (e.g. when trying to progress the transfer)
00104     c_ftp_transfer_error_aborted,   // a transfer was aborted by user intention
00105     c_ftp_transfer_error_failed,    // a transfer failed due to technical reasons
00106     c_ftp_transfer_error_complete   // a transfer was completed
00107 };
00108 
00109 enum FtpTransferDirection {
00110     c_ftp_transfer_direction_in,    // ingoing transfer
00111     c_ftp_transfer_direction_out    // outgoing transfer
00112 };
